title_full: MNAREL01-BP01 Incorporate fault tolerance to achieve high availability as required for your industry vertical and customer expectations
title: Incorporate fault tolerance to achieve high availability as required for your industry vertical and customer expectations
description: These are two important concepts in the concept of availability. Fault tolerance is the ability to withstand subsystem failure and maintain availability (working properly within an established SLA). To implement fault tolerance, workloads use spare (or redundant) subsystems. Fault isolation minimizes the scope of impact when a failure does occur. This is typically implemented with modularization. Workloads are broken down into small subsystems that fail independently and can be repaired in isolation.

title_full: MNAREL01-BP02 Establish SLAs, including DR RTO and RPO for the combined organization
title: Establish SLAs, including DR RTO and RPO for the combined organization
description: Critical platforms require high availability. It is advised to achieve the maximum required availability at a reasonable cost that meets customer and business needs.

title_full: MNAREL01-BP03 Establish a deployment strategy for combined company
title: Establish a deployment strategy for combined company
description: AWS provides a number of tools to simplify and automate the provisioning of infrastructure and deployment of applications. Each deployment service offers different capabilities for managing applications. To build a successful deployment architecture, evaluate the available features of each service against the needs your application and organization.

title_full: MNAREL01-BP04 Establish an SRE team and process for the combined organization
title: Establish an SRE team and process for the combined organization
description: Site reliability engineering (SRE) is the practice of using software tools to automate IT infrastructure tasks such as system management and application monitoring. Organizations use SRE to keep their software applications reliable amidst frequent updates from development teams.
